The web view automatically chooses whether content can be displayed in full screen. By default, web views use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebView-swift.struct/ElementFullscreenBehavior/disabled] behavior.

# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static let automatic: WebView.ElementFullscreenBehavior
```

## Discussion

The web view automatically chooses whether content can be displayed in full screen. By default, web views use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebView-swift.struct/ElementFullscreenBehavior/disabled] behavior.
title: automatic
